original_text:
though he cannot bear to let it go
    and lets it linger in his mouth,
korean_text: 아껴서 버리지 아니하고 입천장에 물고 있을지라도

sentences.original_text: though he cannot bear to let it go
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그것을 놓아주는 것을 견딜 수 없을지라도

sentences.original_text: and lets it linger in his mouth
